Articles.Content:
So, I sorta made some lore for ksp. Here goes nothing...[plz dont critisise my science]

a long time ago, there was a race of kerbaloids called humans, and they created stuff such as pyramids [desert monument],airports [island runway]

and even had a space agency [old ksc, I guess]. They thrived, and even went to the mun  moon [neil armstrong memorial]!

They developed interstellar travel, and most of the race left the planet, aptly named earth, to start a new beginning.

A short bunch of the people left behind, to maintain the earth.

Several billions of years later, the sun is dying, and the humans are in trouble. They want to contact their interstellar brothers, but their radios aren't powerful enough, and there aren't

enough spaceships/fuel to save themselves, so they just wait and hope luck will save them.

As it turns out, it did.

The magnetical pulses from the sun repelled the planet away, past mars and the asteroid belt, to a encounter with jupiter.

The gravity from jupiter ripped a large chunk of earth, and the small debris that was left formed, over time, mimnus.

Over time, earth formed itself back together, to a much smaller scale.

The humans, by now starved, hurt, and badly depressed, started to evolve into the race that we now call the kerbals.

The new earth, named kerbin, started on it's trip, lasting 400 generations, and over a distance of 8 light years.

The kerbals lived underground in this time [The surface was freezing], on a heavy diet to save the scarce food which could only come from farms, making them a lot smaller.

After a long journey, kerbin finally got captured to a small star that we now call kerbol, and the kerbolar system.

Wow, that's the most typing that i've done in a while.

like or comment to show support? please?
not bad lore! It would make sense that this could be very similar, hence the similar names of the Moon and the Mun.
